a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Precipitation anomaly in the United States, 1901 to 2015
Annual anomalies compared with the average precipitation from 1901 to 2000 based on rainfall and snowfall
measurements from land-based weather stations. Anomalies across all US states were then aggregated based on
weighted averages (by area) to define a national result.
Data source: National Oceanic & Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) via the US EPA
